item.title: MIUI OS1.0.10.0.UNXCNXM Fastboot update for Xiaomi Pad 6S Pro 12.4 China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Xiaomi Pad 6S Pro 12.4 China

Codename: sheng

Version: OS1.0.10.0.UNXCNXM | 14.0

Size: 7.8 GB

MD5: 3afc9964559d8ad9efa133a40a9c4290

Changelog:
[System]
Updated the security patch to July 2024. Increased system security.
[End-to-end security]
New: When the battery level of the tablet in the second row exceeds 80%, charging will stop automatically

Download: Here
